name: The "7" Game - Fixed Version
description:
Hello everyone. I know it's not perfect, but I tried. Next time it will be better. 

The goal of this game is to get 7 of "The 7" score. You get 1 "The 7" point for every normal 7 normal points. It's getting harder when there are a few more killing balls .

Have fun and give me your feedback.

Thanks.

PS: Every time you die you'll need to refresh the page.
